items.title: JPMorgan upgrades Nike to overweight, citing a multi-year recover path
items.description: JPMorgan believes that shares of Nike could rise 18% from here.

items.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these dividend stocks for regular income
items.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including EOG Resources and Verizon, favored by Wall Street.

items.title: Two brokers vie to be Asia’s Robinhood as Hong Kong expands crypto support
items.description: Stock analysts are getting excited about the potential boost to Asian crypto trading after Hong Kong's stablecoin bill takes effect Friday.

items.title: Stocks Jefferies’ analysts like going into earnings against the Wall Street consensus
items.description: Some stocks Jefferies likes ahead of earnings that haven't felt the love recently include Spotify and Clorox.

items.title: Earnings playbook: Reporting season ramps up with more ‘Magnificent 7’ results this week
items.description: This coming week marks the busiest one of the second quarter corporate earnings season, and some of the world's biggest companies are on the docket.
